body:
Hi Arthur,

Thank you for sending the files. I wonder if the white space in the address causes all the issue when you run it from Honeybee:

C:\Users\user\Dropbox\COMPANIES\**Mamou-Mani ltd**\

This is a limitation in the current version, and we are aware of that and will be fixed for next versions: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/13](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/13)

Cheers,

Mostapha
